name: 2D Platformer (myvo2612)
description:
When entering the main menu, there are 2 options: PLAY or QUIT. The main menu has some information about the control keys; the player has to use AD/arrow keys to move left or right, and space key to jump. When hitting PLAY button on the main menu, a dude, a main character of the game, will jump into level 1 directly. There are many obstacles on the way and the dude has to jump over them. He also needs collect coins to get more points. The dude will die whenever he hit the obstacles. There are total 3 lives for him. When the dude touches the red door, the game will load the next level.

Mechanics: Overcoming obstacles, wall jumping, sliding movement, touching red door
